description: Detects usage of the wevtutil utility to perform reconnaissance
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
false_positives: Legitmate usage of the utility by administrators to query the event log
name: Potential Recon Activity Using Wevtutil
query: (process.executable.text:*\\wevtutil.exe AND process.command_line.text:(*\ qe\ * OR *\ query\-events\ *) AND process.command_line.text:(*Microsoft\-Windows\-TerminalServices\-LocalSessionManager\/Operational* OR *Microsoft\-Windows\-Terminal\-Services\-RemoteConnectionManager\/Operational* OR *Security*))
